text: Association of Islamic Revolution Loyalists (; Jameiyat-e Vafaadaaraan-e Enghelab-e Eslami) is a minor conservative political group in Iran. In 2016 their candidates withdrew from the legislative election and endorsed the Principlists Grand Coalition. == Notable members == * Fereydoon Abbasi, former VP * Alireza Ali-Ahmadi, former minister * Abbas Sheybani, former MP * Ali Marvi, former MP == References == Category:Principlist political groups in Iran Category:Political parties established in 2003 Category:2003 establishments in Iran
title: Association of Islamic Revolution Loyalists
